                       Graph gameGraph)
                throws java.io.IOException

        public boolean saveMap​(Graph gameGraph,
                       java.lang.String mp)
                throws java.io.IOException

        Specified by:
        saveMap in interface IMap
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true(If the method executes and the map is saved) or false(If no map name is entered or is invalid)

        Returns:
        true(If the total count equals the total number of countries; Map is validated) or false(If the map is not connected)
